name: Book store
description:
# Objective
The objective of this code is to create two classes, Book and BookStore, that represent a book and a library, respectively.

# Class 'Book'

The Book class represents a book with the following properties:
- Title: the title of the book.
- Author: the author of the book.
- ISBN: the ISBN of the book.
- Price: the price of the book.

The class has a constructor that initializes the properties with the input values.

# Class 'BookStore'
The 'BookStore' class represents a library with the following methods:
- 'AddBook': adds a book to the library's collection of books.
- 'GetTotalInventoryValue': calculates and returns the total value of the library's book inventory.
- 'GetAuthorInventoryValue': calculates and returns the value of the book inventory for a specific author.

The class has a private list books to store the 'books' in the library.

Have fun and good luck ;)
